channel.title: CVE Feed for BracketSpace -- Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BracketSpace -- Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control

item.title: CVE-2024-31926|2024-04-11T12:39:43.169Z -- BracketSpace -- Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BracketSpace Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Advanced Cron Manager – debug & control: from n/a through 2.5.2.
